description: Construction of a rear mansard roof extension and three rear roof dormers, part single, part two storey rear extension (following demolition of existing ground floor conservatory and two storey rear outrigger); excavation to provide basement, including lightwell to rear and pavement lights to street frontage; installation of balcony to the first floor front elevation; installation of front dormer window; installation of 8 solar panels and one roof lights to front roof slope; and alteration to the boundary wall including installation of a fence and a gate (Retrospective).
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Site Location Plan, 1334/EX50 - Existing Block Plan, 1334/EX00 -basement floor as existing, 1334/EX01 - front elevation as existing, 1334/EX02 - Rear elevation as existing, 1334/EX03 - Side elevation as existing, 1334/EX04 - Side elevation as existing, 1334/EX10 - Ground floor as existing, 1334/EX20 - First floor as existing, 1334/EX30 - Second floor and roof plan as existing, 1334/PEX00 - basement as pre-existing, 1334/PEX01 - front elevation as pre-existing, 1334/PEX02 - rear elevation as pre-existing, 1334/PEX03 - adjacent side elevation (north) as pre-existing, 1334/PEX04 - side elevation (south) as pre-existing, 1334/PEX05 - Section AA as pre-existing, 1334/PEX06 - Section BB as pre-existing, 1334/PEX07 - section CC as pre-existing, 1334/PEX10 - ground floor as pre-existing, 1334/PEX20 - first floor as pre-existing, 1334/PEX30 - Top floor as pre-existing, 1334/PEX040 - roof plan as pre-existing.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
